name: Shooter Zombies
description:
The bad day at a laboratory, noone stayed live there. Now, there are only

zombies who want go out. It's a danger number one for all people worldwide,

we have no cure against zombies gene. Fortunately, there are strong soldiers i

n the army who decided go to the laboratory and try to kill all 35 zombies. You

are one of these two men. Good luck, national hero. Have fun.
